document_data.mainbody:
Gem stones had a base value of 1000 gp once they are cut and polished.
Some typical gem stones found in the Realms
* Black opal
* Fire opal
* Jasmal
* Moonbar
* Opal
* Orblen
* Orl
* Ravenar
* Red tears
* Sapphire
* Shou Lung amethyst
* Shou Lung topaz
* Tomb jade
* Water opal
* Zendalure
